Standings order: (1) most points (2) winning percentage

Each team is awarded points on the following basis:
3 points for a victory
1 point for a draw
0 points for a loss
Tie-Breakers For Playoffs: (1) head to head competition (2) record against common opponent(3) strength of schedule
